column5: Planning my annual October walleye and northern trip to Ontario. Any comments regarding the quality of fishing lakes and lodging in the Jellicoe area? Pasha Lake Cabins? Onaman Lake, etc? Going with wife and parents so inside toilets, showers, CLEAN almost a necessity! We'll have 3 weeks to spend so hope to do some checking on our own but can always use a headstart! Thanks for any info. Bryan
